wiki.powah.energy_cell: The Energy Cell is an FE energy storage device, Input an output energy from 6 configurable sides, high tiers store more energy, when broken will keep all the energy stored in it.
wiki.powah.solar_panel: The Solar panel is a block that generates FE energy from sun light, high tiers generates more FE/t, when broken will keep all the energy stored in it.
wiki.powah.furnator: The Furnator is a block that generates FE energy by consuming Furnace fuel like coal, wood ..., high tiers processing faster depending on the FE/t, when broken will keep all the energy stored in it.
wiki.powah.magmatic_generator: The Magmatic Generator is a block that generates FE energy by consuming high temp fluids like Lava, high tiers processing faster depending on the FE/t, when broken will keep all the energy stored in it.
wiki.powah.player_transmitter: Player Transmitter is a block that charge items in linked player inventory including armor slots and off hand any wher in the same dimension, require a Binding Card to link, when broken will keep all the energy stored in it.
wiki.powah.player_transmitter_dim: Dimensional Player Transmitter is a block that charge items in linked player inventory including armor slots and off hand any wher across dimension, require a Binding Card to link, can add max of 2 Binding cards, when broken will keep all the energy stored in it.
wiki.powah.binding_card: Used to link player with certain blocks eg: Player Transmitter, Right click to bind.
wiki.powah.capacitor_blazing: Use a Large Basic Capacitor on a Blaze.
wiki.powah.capacitor_niotic: Use a Blazing Capacitor on a Diamond Ore.
wiki.powah.capacitor_spirited: Use a Niotic Capacitor on a Emerald Ore.
wiki.powah.player_aerial_pearl: Use an Aerial Pearl on a Zombie or Husk.
